txt.en: Snow-beasts have made their home in Grymmclúd, the Roaring Stones.
A pack of snow-beasts has been discovered in Grymmclúd, near the Clovengate.\n\nYou should defeat snow-beasts and their pack-leader, Stormbár, in Grymmclúd.

'Did you clear out those snow-beasts? Thank you, [placeholder]. Snow-beast ambushes are not a pretty sight, and now our reinforcements need not fear one. They will have enough to worry about with all these hobgoblins and Angmarim around!'
Kyrstig can be found near Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold.\n\nYou should talk to Kyrstig.

'I discovered a pack of vicious snow-beasts living in a craggy area near the Clovengate. I have taken to calling it Grymmclúd, or the Roaring Stones, because you can hear the echoing roars from quite far away. So? What are you waiting for?'

Kyrstig looks at you expectantly.

'I don't need to convince you that a pack of dwarf-eating beasts so near the road is dangerous, do I? Please clear the place out, [placeholder]!'
